sen.j: 藤原 経子（ふじわら の けいし/ つねこ、生没年未詳）は、平安時代後期の女官。
sen.e: FUJIWARA no Keishi (also Tsuneko, dates of birth and death unknown) was a court lady during the latter half of the Heian period.

sen.j: 父は従三位大宰大弐・藤原経平。
sen.e: Her father was Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank) Dazai no daini (Senior Assistant Governor General of the Dazai-fu (local government office in Kyushu region)) FUJIWARA no Tsunehira.

sen.j: 後三条天皇・白河天皇両天皇に典侍として仕える。
sen.e: She served as a Naishi no suke (a court lady of the first rank) for both Emperor Gosanjo and Emperor Shirakawa.

sen.j: 承保2年（1075年）4月、白河天皇の寵愛を受けて皇子（覚行法親王）を産む。
sen.e: She was favored by Emperor Shirakawa, and she gave birth to a prince (Cloistered Imperial Prince Kakugyo) in April, 1075.
